Module Basics
Package basics.util

Class ArrayUtil

java.lang.Object
basics.util.ArrayUtil
public class ArrayUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Utility functions for arrays and ArrayLists.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)
